hero.title: Professional Web

businessSection.title: Unlock Your Business Potential with Kavushion
businessSection.subtitle: Kavushion is a trusted website development service provider that helps businesses, startups, and personal brands build a strong online presence. We create responsive, SEO-friendly, and high-performance websites tailored to your industry goals...

2.title: Development & Implementation
2.description: Our developers bring your vision to life using clean code and scalable architecture.

3.title: Testing & Optimization
3.description: We rigorously test functionality, performance, and responsiveness.

faq.title: Get all your questions answered here
faq.subtitle: It’s extremely embarrassing adding the same contact in two different campaigns.

faqs.question: What is ManyReach Used For?
faqs.answer: ManyReach is used to automate outreach and manage campaigns by uploading contacts and tracking engagement.

faqs.question: Can I Upload As Many Contacts As I Want?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upload unlimited contacts depending on your subscription plan.

faqs.question: What is a credit?
faqs.answer: A credit is a unit that represents one outreach attempt or contact search depending on the service.
